name: String.io
description:
String.io is a brand new IO game!
The goal is pretty simple. Just capture as much territory as possible!
Take care! Your enemies are extremely smart!

HOW TO PLAY
● Enclose an area with your string to capture new land.
● Attack other players by hitting their tails.

FEATURES
● Over 30 colorful avatar to unlock
● Amazing minimalism graphics
● Up to 4 control methods to choose
● Online PVP coming soon

Join this game and beat people all around the world!
